entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git cd devops-deployment sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-sme-be-prod.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-sme-be-prod@sha256:a62a962628babf02f3dbdb58f753f37289bb5f2cd632b5979be96a9bf9da7322+g' ./swa-be/production-sme/.argocd-source.yaml sed -i "s/creationTimestamp:.*/creationTimestamp: '2023-03-13T03:40:44Z'/" ./swa-be/production-sme/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./swa-be/production-sme/.argocd-source.yaml git commit -m 'Done by Jenkins Job changemanifest: swm-sme-be-prod:35' git push https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git HEAD:refs/heads/master
